Question
========

33 % of employees prefer a male boss. 13 % prefer a woman; What then is the probability of any of the remaining workers, who do not care to have a man or a woman as their boss? have?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,13
* 0,33
* 0,46
* 0,54

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.13: Incorrect
* 0.33: Incorrect
* 0.46: Incorrect
* 0.54: Correct
